Flow.label: Referral (Website): Care Connect Hunter Manning & Hunter Central Coast

fields.name: Hospitalfollowingasuicideattempt
fields.fieldText: Did they present to hospital following a suicide attempt?

fields.name: Discharge_Date
fields.helpText: If discharge date is unknown please leave blank

fields.name: Is_there_a_Mental_Health_Care_Plan_in_place
fields.fieldText: Is there a Mental Health Care Plan in place?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 255 characters.
Character Limit is 1000 characters.

fields.name: ImpactingPsychosocialFactors
fields.fieldText: What are the primary reasons you would like assistance from Care Connect?

fields.name: Safety_Risks
fields.fieldText: Are there any safety concerns for this person, including self-harm, suicidal thoughts, abuse, domestic violence, risk taking behaviours, harmful substance use, or any other challenges?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 1000 characters.

fields.name: OtherReasons
fields.fieldText: Is there anything else we should know?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 32768 characters.

fields.name: ConsentText
fields.fieldText: By submitting this online referral, the participant being referred has given verbal consent that they would like to engage with Social Futures, are willing to have their details stored in our system, and are willing to be contacted.

fields.name: ReferralCompleteText
fields.fieldText:
Referral Complete


Thank you for completing the online form, your details have been recorded and successfully submitted

value.stringValue: Do you want to receive a copy of the Referral via email?

fields.name: ReferralCompleteTextEmail
fields.fieldText: Press Next to be redirected back to the Care Connect page on the Social Futures website and an email will be sent to your inbox.

fields.name: ReferralCompleteTextNoEmail
fields.fieldText: Press Next to be redirected back to the Care Connect page on the Social Futures website.

fields.name: FaultText
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, something went wrong :(


Please review the below text, it may explain the problem in a way you can fix by pressing "Previous" and changing your entered data. Otherwise, please screenshot this error, and send it to IT Support.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: MissingAddressInformationText
fields.fieldText:
Missing Information:


The address must contain the following:


  • City
  • State
  • Postcode

Please return to the previous page and enter the required address information.

fields.name: MissingEmailText
fields.fieldText:
Missing Email:


If your Preferred Method of Contact is set to Email then an Email Address must be provided.

Please return to the previous page and enter the required email address or change the preferred method of contact.

fields.name: Missing_Referral_Email_Text
fields.fieldText:
Missing Email:


If you want to receive the Referral as an Email please enter an email into the email field provided.

Press Previous to return to the previous page and enter the required email address or select no to receiving the referral as an email.

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 100 characters.

fields.name: Culturally_and_Linguistically_Diverse
fields.fieldText: Do you identify as the following?

fields.name: Disability
fields.fieldText: Does the participant identify as a person with a disability?

fields.name: Date_of_Birth
fields.fieldText: Date of Birth (Please use the date picker)

validationRule.errorMessage: Phone numbers must be 10-13 digits long and only numerical values are accepted. The plus symbol at the beginning is also valid.
Please enter a valid email address or leave this field blank if no email can be provided.

fields.name: AddressText
fields.fieldText: If the person does not have a fixed residential address, please search for the suburb where they are residing

validationRule.errorMessage: Address must contain at least the City, State and Postal Code.

fields.name: Referrer_Details
fields.fieldText: Referrer Details

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 200 characters.
Cannot contain more than 50 characters.
Phone numbers must be 10-13 digits long and only numerical values are accepted. The plus symbol at the beginning is also valid.

fields.name: ReferralMainText
fields.fieldText: Care Connect Referral Form

fields.name: CareConnectDescription
fields.fieldText:
Care Connect is an aftercare program for anyone in the Hunter Manning and Hunter Central Coast region who has attempted suicide and needs support accessing and engaging with the services available to help them.


Care Connect is a free program designed to support participants following a suicide attempt, to build their capacity to self-manage, and to ensure long-term plans are in place by connecting with other services and community supports.


Please note this online referral form is for only for service providers to complete.


Please use the Contact Us form on the Social Futures web page if you are not a service provider.

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_upload_any_files_to_the_referral
fields.fieldText: Would you like to upload any files to the referral?

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Contact_Person}, 

  

Thank you for submitting your referral form. We will be reviewing your information shortly. 

 

A member of our team will be in touch with the referred person soon to follow up and discuss the next steps. 

  

In the meantime, please find a copy of your submitted referral attached as a PDF for your records. 

  

We also want to confirm that, if you are referring someone other than yourself, you have obtained their consent for this referral and for our team to contact them directly. 

  

If you have any immediate questions, feel free to reach out to us at 1800 719 625. 

  

We look forward to connecting with you. 

  

Best regards, 

Social Futures
